snippet: Ernst & Young found that 20 percent of corporate officials and employees knew of financial manipulation within their company in the last year.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column on how ethical businesses are worldwide; cites survey of officers and employees of large companies in 36 countries in Europe, Middle East, Africa and Asia, finding one-fifth of them were aware of financial ethical violations at their own company.
lead_paragraph: Ernst & Young found that 20 percent of corporate officials and employees knew of financial manipulation within their company in the last year.

headline.print_headline: A Troubling Survey on Global Corruption
headline.main: A Troubling Survey on Global Corruption
